name: 1001 Jigsaw. Cute Cats 4
description:
Cute cats will melt the coldest hearts! The wide range of features of the game "1001 Jigsaw. Cute Cats 4" will bring your head to the ground.

This is a user-friendly game, where everything is thought out for a comfortable game of puzzles. You can use hints to pass the level, take a break saving the result, or select the appropriate level of difficulty if the puzzle is not formed the first time. The game is suitable for all categories of players - from beginners to professionals.

- 500 high quality pictures
- Sophisticated game mode with handy hints, sorting and a magnifier
- Individual difficulty settings for each puzzle allow you to play forever
- feature to turn off the rotation of puzzle pieces
- the ability to save and continue a puzzle at any time
- For those who like excitement - special tasks and colorful trophies
- pleasant relaxing music
- New part in the series of games
